name: Back to the harder Past
description:
"Back to the harder Past" is a puzzle platformer made for the BrackeysJam 2020.2. ( Theme: Rewind) After beating a level you play the harder version of it.  The player's goal is to destroy the crystal by shooting  it or making enemies shoot it.  Controls: 

A-D to move.

 Space to jump. 

Left Mouse to shoot.

R to restart.

Made by SGC. 

Art by Cheiloguer

Music by SammyTom.

Code by Galse22.
